lang="en">Reserved</span></a></span>）</span></span>则是全国最大的服装连锁店<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-427"><a href="#cite_note-427">[427]</a></sup>。
</p><p>历史上，时尚一直是波兰文化及民族意识的重要组成部分。16世纪起，波兰形成了独特的<a href="/wiki/%E8%90%A8%E5%B0%94%E9%A9%AC%E6%8F%90%E4%BA%9A%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89" title="萨尔马提亚主义">萨尔马提亚主义</a>生活方式。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Sarmat_428-0"><a href="#cite_note-Sarmat-428">[428]</a></sup>同时，波兰的服饰传入<a href="/wiki/%E5%87%A1%E5%B0%94%E8%B5%9B%E5%AE%AB" title="凡尔赛宫">凡尔赛宫</a>，影响了<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD" title="法国">法国</a>的服饰文化。此外，波兰的家具文化也影响了法国，<a href="/wiki/%E6%B4%9B%E5%8F%AF%E5%8F%AF" title="洛可可">洛可可</a>式天篷床在法国贵族当中成为时尚。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-429"><a href="#cite_note-429">[429]</a></sup>18世纪以后，萨尔马提亚主义走向衰落。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Sarmat_428-1"><a href="#cite_note-Sarmat-428">[428]</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id=".E7.94.B5.E5.BD.B1"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="电影">电影</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=41" title="编辑章节：电影">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="1702" data-file-width="2400" decoding="async" height="156" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/34/Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg/220px-Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/34/Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg/330px-Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/34/Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg/440px-Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Andrzej_Wajda_1974.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><a href="/wiki/%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E7%83%88%C2%B7%E8%8F%AF%E4%BE%9D%E9%81%94" title="安德烈·華依達">安杰依·瓦伊达</a></div></div></div>
<p>波兰电影的起源可以追溯到1894年<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Kazimierz Prószyński" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="卡齐米日·普罗申斯基"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E9%BD%90%E7%B1%B3%E6%97%A5%C2%B7%E6%99%AE%E7%BD%97%E7%94%B3%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="卡齐米日·普罗申斯基（页面不存在）">卡齐米日·普罗申斯基</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kazimierz_Pr%C3%B3szy%C5%84ski" title="en:Kazimierz Prószyński"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Kazimierz Prószyński</span></a></span>）</span></span>发明的早期电影摄影机。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-CinFord_430-0"><a href="#cite_note-CinFord-430">[430]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Haltof_431-0"><a href="#cite_note-Haltof-431">[431]</a></sup>1897年，<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jan Szczepanik" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="扬·斯泽帕尼克"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%89%AC%C2%B7%E6%96%AF%E6%B3%BD%E5%B8%95%E5%B0%BC%E5%85%8B&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="扬·斯泽帕尼克（页面不存在）">扬·斯泽帕尼克</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Szczepanik" title="en:Jan Szczepanik"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jan Szczepanik</span></a></span>）</span></span>制造出了早期的图像声音传输设备。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-CinFord_430-1"><a href="#cite_note-CinFord-430">[430]</a></sup>波兰涌现出了很多优秀的导演、制片人和演员，如<a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E6%9B%BC%C2%B7%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="羅曼·波蘭斯基">羅曼·波蘭斯基</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E7%83%88%C2%B7%E8%8F%AF%E4%BE%9D%E9%81%94" title="安德烈·華依達">安杰依·瓦伊达</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E6%8B%89%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E6%A0%BC%E9%87%8C" title="波拉·尼格里">波拉·尼格里</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%A1%9E%E7%BC%AA%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%88%88%E5%BE%B7%E6%B8%A9" title="塞缪尔·戈德温">塞缪尔·戈德温</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%8E%E7%BA%B3%E5%85%84%E5%BC%9F" title="华纳兄弟">华纳兄弟</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Max Fleischer" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="马克斯·弗莱舍"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%BC%97%E8%8E%B1%E8%88%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="马克斯·弗莱舍（页面不存在）">马克斯·弗莱舍</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Fleischer" title="en:Max Fleischer"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Max Fleischer</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E6%A0%BC%E6%B6%85%E7%B5%B2%E5%8D%A1%C2%B7%E9%9C%8D%E8%98%AD" title="阿格涅絲卡·霍蘭">阿格涅絲卡·霍蘭</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Krzysztof Zanussi" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="克日什托夫·扎努西"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%85%8B%E6%97%A5%E4%BB%80%E6%89%98%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E6%89%8E%E5%8A%AA%E8%A5%BF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="克日什托夫·扎努西（页面不存在）">克日什托夫·扎努西</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Krzysztof_Zanussi" title="en:Krzysztof Zanussi"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Krzysztof Zanussi</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%85%8B%E6%97%A5%E4%BB%80%E6%89%98%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E5%9F%BA%E8%80%B6%E6%96%AF%E6%B4%9B%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基">克日什托夫·基耶斯洛夫斯基</a>等。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-432"><a href="#cite_note-432">[432]</a></sup>
</p><p>波兰电影普遍探讨的主题包括<a href="/wiki/%E6%99%82%E4%BB%A3%E5%8A%87" title="時代劇">历史</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%87%E6%83%85%E7%89%87" title="劇情片">剧情</a>、战争、文化、<a href="/wiki/%E9%BB%91%E8%89%B2%E7%94%B5%E5%BD%B1" title="黑色电影">黑色电影</a>等。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-CinFord_430-2"><a href="#cite_note-CinFord-430">[430]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Haltof_431-1"><a href="#cite_note-Haltof-431">[431]</a></sup>21世纪以来，共有2部波兰电影获得<a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A5%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%E9%87%91%E5%83%8F%E5%A5%96" title="奥斯卡金像奖">奥斯卡金像奖</a>，分别是<a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E6%9B%BC%C2%B7%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="羅曼·波蘭斯基">羅曼·波蘭斯基</a>导演的《<a href="/wiki/%E9%92%A2%E7%90%B4%E5%AE%B6_(%E7%94%B5%E5%BD%B1)" title="钢琴家 (电影)">钢琴家</a>》（2002年上映）及<a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%95%E7%BB%B4%E4%B9%8C%C2%B7%E5%B8%95%E5%A4%AB%E5%88%A9%E7%A7%91%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="帕维乌·帕夫利科夫斯基">帕维乌·帕夫利科夫斯基</a>导演的《<a href="/wiki/%E4%BF%AE%E5%A5%B3%E4%BC%8A%E5%BE%B7" title="修女伊德">修女伊达</a>》（2013年上映）。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Haltof_431-2"><a href="#cite_note-Haltof-431">[431]</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id=".E5.AA.92.E4.BD.93"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="媒体">媒体</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=42" title="编辑章节：媒体">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="4605" data-file-width="6940" decoding="async" height="146" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg/220px-Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg/330px-Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9f/Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg/440px-Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Siedziba_Telewizji_Polskiej_w_Warszawie_2017.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0" title="波蘭電視台">波兰电视台</a>华沙总部</div></div></div>
<p>根据<a href="/wiki/%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E6%99%B4%E9%9B%A8%E8%A1%A8" title="歐洲晴雨表">歐洲晴雨表</a>2015年的报告，78%的波兰人有每天收看<a href="/wiki/%E7%94%B5%E8%A7%86" title="电视">电视</a>的习惯。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-PPCP_433-0"><a href="#cite_note-PPCP-433">[433]</a></sup>2020年，波兰全国79%的人口每天阅读新闻两次以上，仅次于<a href="/wiki/%E7%91%9E%E5%85%B8" title="瑞典">瑞典</a>。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-434"><a href="#cite_note-434">[434]</a></sup>波兰拥有多家媒体机构，主要有<a href="/wiki/%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%BB%A3%E6%92%AD" title="公共廣播">公共电视</a>机构<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0" title="波蘭電視台">波兰电视台</a>（TVP）、两家免费电视台（<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="TVN (Polish TV channel)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="TVN (波兰)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=TVN_(%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="TVN (波兰)（页面不存在）">TVN</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TVN_(Polish_TV_channel)" title="en:TVN (Polish TV channel)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">TVN (Polish TV channel)</span></a></span>）</span></span>和<a href="/wiki/Polsat" title="Polsat">Polsat</a>）以及三家24小时新闻台。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-435"><a href="#cite_note-435">[435]</a></sup>波兰电视台也提供聚焦于特定主题的频道，如<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0%E9%AB%94%E8%82%B2%E9%A0%BB%E9%81%93" title="波蘭電視台體育頻道">體育頻道</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0%E6%AD%B7%E5%8F%B2%E9%A0%BB%E9%81%93" title="波蘭電視台歷史頻道">歷史頻道</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96%E9%A0%BB%E9%81%93" title="波蘭電視台文化頻道">文化頻道</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0%E5%A8%9B%E6%A8%82%E9%A0%BB%E9%81%93" title="波蘭電視台娛樂頻道">娛樂頻道</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="TVP Polonia" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="波蘭電視台波蘭頻道"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%9B%BB%E8%A6%96%E5%8F%B0%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%A0%BB%E9%81%93&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="波蘭電視台波蘭頻道（页面不存在）">波蘭頻道</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TVP_Polonia" title="en:TVP Polonia"><span dir="auto" lang="en">TVP Polonia</span></a></span>）</span></span>等。其中，波兰频道是由国家开设的专供海外波兰侨民收看的波兰语电视频道。2020年，波兰最受欢迎的报纸类型是<a href="/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%8A%A5_(%E7%89%88%E5%BC%8F)" title="小报 (版式)">小报</a>和社会政治类报纸<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-PPCP_433-1"><a href="#cite_note-PPCP-433">[433]</a></sup>。
</p><p>波兰在欧洲的<a href="/wiki/%E7%94%B5%E5%AD%90%E6%B8%B8%E6%88%8F" title="电子游戏">电子游戏</a>产业版图中占有重要地位，涌现出了<a href="/wiki/CD_Projekt" title="CD Projekt">CD Projekt</a>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Techland" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Techland"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Techland&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Techland（页面不存在）">Techland</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Techland" title="en:Techland"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Techland</span></a></span>）</span></span>、<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Farm 51" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="51农场 (公司)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=51%E5%86%9C%E5%9C%BA_(%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="51农场 (公司)（页面不存在）">51农场</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Farm_51" title="en:The Farm 51"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Farm 51</span></a></span>）</span></span>等著名游戏开发商。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Games_436-0"><a href="#cite_note-Games-436">[436]</a></sup><a href="/wiki/%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%E7%B3%BB%E5%88%97" title="巫师系列">《巫师》系列</a>和《<a href="/wiki/%E8%B5%9B%E5%8D%9A%E6%9C%8B%E5%85%8B2077" title="赛博朋克2077">赛博朋克2077</a>》是波兰最著名的电子游戏作品。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Games_436-1"><a href="#cite_note-Games-436">[436]</a></sup><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%A1%E6%89%98%E7%BB%B4%E5%85%B9" title="卡托维兹">卡托维兹</a>是<a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E7%89%B9%E5%B0%94%E6%9E%81%E9%99%90%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88%E8%B5%9B" title="英特尔极限大师赛">英特尔极限大师赛</a>决赛的固定举办地。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Games_436-2"><a href="#cite_note-Games-436">[436]</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id=".E9.AB.94.E8.82.B2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="體育">體育</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=43" title="编辑章节：體育">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">主条目：<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E9%AB%94%E8%82%B2" title="波蘭體育">波蘭體育</a></div>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg"><img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="2432" data-file-width="3648" decoding="async" height="147" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0c/Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg/220px-Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0c/Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg/330px-Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0c/Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg/440px-Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg 2x" width="220"/></a> <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Stadion_Narodowy_Maj2012.jpg" title="放大"></a></div><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8F%AF%E6%B2%99%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E9%AB%94%E8%82%B2%E5%A0%B4" title="華沙國家體育場">華沙國家體育場</a>，為<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/2012%E5%B9%B4%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E9%8C%A6%E6%A8%99%E8%B3%BD" title="2012年歐洲足球錦標賽">2012年歐洲足球錦標賽</a>的舉辦場地之一</div></div></div>
<p><a href="/wiki/%E6%8E%92%E7%90%83" title="排球">排球</a>和<a href="/wiki/%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83" title="足球">足球</a>是波蘭最流行的運動，有悠久的国际比赛历史。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-FIFA_World_Cup_Statistics-Poland_437-0"><a href="#cite_note-FIFA_World_Cup_Statistics-Poland-437">[437]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-FIFA_Statistics_–_Poland_438-0"><a href="#cite_note-FIFA_Statistics_–_Poland-438">[438]</a></sup><a href="/wiki/%E7%94%B0%E8%B3%BD%E5%92%8C%E5%BE%91%E8%B3%BD" title="田賽和徑賽">田徑</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B1%83%E7%90%83" title="籃球">籃球</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E7%90%83" title="手球">手球</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%8B%B3%E6%93%8A" title="拳擊">拳擊</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B6%9C%E5%90%88%E6%A0%BC%E9%AC%A5" title="綜合格鬥">綜合格鬥</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B2%99%E5%9C%B0%E6%91%A9%E6%89%98%E8%BD%A6" title="沙地摩托车">沙地摩托车</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%B3%E5%8F%B0%E6%BB%91%E9%9B%AA" title="跳台滑雪">跳台滑雪</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%B6%8A%E9%87%8E%E6%BB%91%E9%9B%AA" title="越野滑雪">越野滑雪</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%86%B0%E7%90%83" title="冰球">冰球</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B6%B2%E7%90%83" title="網球">網球</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%93%8A%E5%8A%8D" title="擊劍">擊劍</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%B8%B8%E6%B3%B3" title="游泳">游泳</a>和<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%88%89%E9%87%8D" title="舉重">舉重</a>等运动也颇受波兰人民欢迎。
</p><p>波蘭足球的黃金時代為1970年代至1980年代初。世界盃方面，<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E9%9A%8A" title="波蘭國家足球隊">波蘭國家足球隊</a>在<a href="/wiki/1974%E5%B9%B4%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%B6%B3%E5%8D%94%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83" title="1974年國際足協世界盃">1974年</a>和<a href="/wiki/1982%E5%B9%B4%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%B6%B3%E5%8D%94%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%9B%83" title="1982年國際足協世界盃">1982年世界盃足球賽</a>中獲得季軍；奥运会方面，波兰在<a href="/wiki/1972%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1972年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1972年夏季奧運會</a>中獲得足球项目的金牌，<a href="/wiki/1976%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1976年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1976年</a>和<a href="/wiki/1992%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1992年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1992年</a>则分别获得银牌。2012年，波蘭與<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%83%8F%E5%85%8B%E8%98%AD" title="烏克蘭">烏克蘭</a>共同主辦了<a href="/wiki/2012%E5%B9%B4%E6%AC%A7%E6%B4%B2%E8%B6%B3%E7%90%83%E9%94%A6%E6%A0%87%E8%B5%9B" title="2012年欧洲足球锦标赛">歐洲足球錦標賽</a>。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-warsaw-life_439-0"><a href="#cite_note-warsaw-life-439">[439]</a></sup>
</p><p><a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E8%98%AD%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E6%8E%92%E7%90%83%E9%9A%8A" title="波蘭國家男子排球隊">波蘭國家男子排球隊</a>是世界男子排壇強隊之一。截至2020年2月，波蘭男排在<a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%8E%92%E7%90%83%E8%81%94%E5%90%88%E4%BC%9A%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E6%8E%92%E5%90%8D" title="国际排球联合会世界排名">国际排球联合会排名</a>世界第2<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-440"><a href="#cite_note-440">[440]</a></sup>。波兰曾在<a href="/wiki/1976%E5%B9%B4%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E5%A5%A5%E6%9E%97%E5%8C%B9%E5%85%8B%E8%BF%90%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%9A" title="1976年夏季奥林匹克运动会">1976年夏季奧運會</a>中获得排球项目的金牌，并获得过三次<a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E6%8E%92%E7%90%83%E9%94%A6%E6%A0%87%E8%B5%9B" title="世界男子排球锦标赛">世界男子排球锦标赛</a>冠军。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-441"><a href="#cite_note-441">[441]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-442"><a href="#cite_note-442">[442]</a></sup>
</p><p>波兰的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%99%BB%E5%B1%B1" title="登山">登山</a>运动水平较高，尤其是在攀登<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%96%9C%E9%A9%AC%E6%8B%89%E9%9B%85%E5%B1%B1" title="喜马拉雅山">喜马拉雅山</a>和其他<a href="/wiki/%E5%85%AB%E5%8D%83%E7%B1%B3%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E5%B1%B1%E5%B3%B0%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8" title="八千米以上山峰列表">海拔八千米以上的山峰</a>方面。<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%BF%9C%E8%B6%B3" title="远足">远足</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E6%BB%91%E9%9B%AA" title="滑雪">滑雪</a>和<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E5%9C%B0%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%8C%E8%BD%A6" title="山地自行车">山地自行车</a>等运动也很发达，每年都吸引着来自世界各地的众多游客。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-turism_298-1"><a href="#cite_note-turism-298">[298]</a></sup>水上运动是波兰最受欢迎的夏季休闲活动，北部地区有大量用于钓鱼、划独木舟、皮划艇、帆船和风帆冲浪的场所。<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-443"><a href="#cite_note-443">[443]</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.82.E8.A7.81"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参见">参见</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=44" title="编辑章节：参见">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><a class="mw-disambig" href="/wiki/%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0%E4%BA%BA%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8" title="波兰人列表">波兰人列表</a></li></ul>
<h2><span id=".E5.8F.82.E8.80.83.E6.96.87.E7.8C.AE"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="参考文献">参考文献</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=45" title="编辑章节：参考文献">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<li id="cite_note-9"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-9">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=39SoSG4NGAoC&amp;pg=PA77&amp;lpg=PA77&amp;dq=poland%27s+millennium&amp;sig=uQ-qK9oxqMuHmVvZJj8lszrm1" rel="nofollow">Disruptive Religion: The Force of Faith in Social-movement Activism</a>. Books.google.com.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2013-09-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190502051648/https://books.google.com/books?id=39SoSG4NGAoC&amp;pg=PA77&amp;lpg=PA77&amp;dq=poland%27s+millennium&amp;sig=uQ-qK9oxqMuHmVvZJj8lszrm1" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2019-05-02）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.btitle=Disruptive+Religion%3A+The+Force+of+Faith+in+Social-movement+Activism&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D39SoSG4NGAoC%26pg%3DPA77%26lpg%3DPA77%26dq%3Dpoland%2527s%2Bmillennium%26sig%3DuQ-qK9oxqMuHmVvZJj8lszrm1&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-A_Concise_History_of_Poland-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-A_Concise_History_of_Poland_10-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Lukowski, Jerzy; Zawaszki, Hubert. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/concisehistoryof0000luko" rel="nofollow">A Concise History of Poland</a> First. </li>

<li id="cite_note-Hannan-22"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Hannan_22-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Hannan, Kevin. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531053534/https://books.google.com/books?id=YmrlAAAAMAAJ&amp;q=poland+persian+lithuanian+hungarian+lechitic" rel="nofollow">Language and Identity in a West Slavic Borderland: The Case of Teschen Silesia</a>. <li id="cite_note-33"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-33">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Ring, Trudy; Watson, Noelle; Schellinger, Paul. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20211015141633/https://books.google.com/books?id=yfPYAQAAQBAJ" rel="nofollow">Northern Europe: International Dictionary of Historic Places</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-44"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-44">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Kumor, Bolesław; Obertyński, Zdzisław. <a class="external text" href="https://www.google.com.au/books/edition/Historia_Ko%C5%9Bcio%C5%82a_w_Polsce/3LrYAAAAMAAJ?hl=en&amp;gbpv=0&amp;bsq=boles%C5%82aw%20morawy%20%C5%82u%C5%BCyce%20w%C4%99gry" rel="nofollow">Historia Kościoła w Polsce</a>. <li id="cite_note-Dembkowski/Lublin-54"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Dembkowski/Lublin_54-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Dembkowski, Harry E. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20211226172629/https://books.google.com/books?id=svAaAAAAMAAJ&amp;q=poland+lithuania+1588+slavery" rel="nofollow">The union of Lublin, Polish federalism in the golden age</a>. <li id="cite_note-79"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-79">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Dyer, Thomas Henry. <a class="external text" href="https://www.google.com.au/books/edition/The_History_of_Modern_Europe/kQZOAAAAcAAJ?hl=en&amp;gbpv=0" rel="nofollow">The History of Modern Europe</a>. <li id="cite_note-auto1-102"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-auto1_102-0"><sup><b>102.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-auto1_102-1"><sup><b>102.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Storozynski, Alex. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531053534/https://books.google.com/books?id=wVqnlTbsdXcC" rel="nofollow">The Peasant Prince: Thaddeus Kosciuszko and the Age of Revolution</a>. <li id="cite_note-134"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-134">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190824050551/https://encyclopedia.ushmm.org/content/en/article/polish-victims" rel="nofollow">Polish Victims</a>. <li id="cite_note-137"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-137">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Wardzyńska, Maria. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20141129035451/http://pamiec.pl/download/49/34737/BYLROK1939.pdf" rel="nofollow">Był rok 1939. Operacja niemieckiej policji bezpieczeństwa w Polsce. Intelligenzaktion [The Year was 1939: Operation of German Security Police in Poland. Intelligenzaktion]</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Institute_of_National_Remembrance&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Institute of National Remembrance（页面不存在）">Institute of National Remembrance</a>. 2009 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">4 January</span> 2020]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-83-7629-063-8" title="Special:网络书源/978-83-7629-063-8"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-83-7629-063-8</a>. （<a class="external text" href="http://pamiec.pl/download/49/34737/BYLROK1939.pdf" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>存档于29 November 2014） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到波兰语网页">（波兰语）</span>. <q>Oblicza się, że akcja „Inteligencja” pochłonęła ponad 100 tys. ofiar. <i>Translation:</i> It is estimated that <i>Intelligenzaktion</i> took the lives of 100,000 Poles.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.aufirst=Maria&amp;rft.aulast=Wardzy%C5%84ska&amp;rft.btitle=By%C5%82+rok+1939.+Operacja+niemieckiej+policji+bezpiecze%C5%84stwa+w+Polsce.+Intelligenzaktion&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-83-7629-063-8&amp;rft.pub=Institute+of+National+Remembrance&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fpamiec.pl%2Fdownload%2F49%2F34737%2FBYLROK1939.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-138"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-138">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Grzegorz Motyka, Od rzezi wołyńskiej do akcji "Wisła". Konflikt polsko-ukraiński 1943–1947. Kraków 2011, p. 447. See also: Book review by Tomasz Stańczyk: "Grzegorz Motyka oblicza, że w latach 1943–1947 z polskich rąk zginęło 11–15 tys. Ukraińców. Polskie straty to 76–106 tys. zamordowanych, w znakomitej większości podczas rzezi wołyńskiej i galicyjskiej."</span>

<li id="cite_note-152"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-152">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220328012855/https://argumentum.al/lajmi/2020/09/solidarity-movement-or-the-beginning-of-the-end-of-communism/" rel="nofollow">Solidarity Movement– or the Beginning of the End of Communism</a>. September 2020 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2022-03-06</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="https://argumentum.al/lajmi/2020/09/solidarity-movement-or-the-beginning-of-the-end-of-communism/" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2022-03-28）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.btitle=Solidarity+Movement%E2%80%93+or+the+Beginning+of+the+End+of+Communism&amp;rft.date=2020-09&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fargumentum.al%2Flajmi%2F2020%2F09%2Fsolidarity-movement-or-the-beginning-of-the-end-of-communism%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-:2-166"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-:2_166-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210328122853/https://ec.europa.eu/commission/presscorner/detail/en/IP_17_5367" rel="nofollow">Rule of Law: European Commission acts to defend judicial independence in Poland</a>. <li id="cite_note-:3-167"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-:3_167-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210310014001/https://verfassungsblog.de/commission-v-poland-what-happened-what-it-means-what-it-will-take/" rel="nofollow">Commission v Poland: What Happened, What it Means, What it Will Take</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-168"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-168">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200713013502/https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-53385021" rel="nofollow">Poland's Duda narrowly beats Trzaskowski in presidential vote</a>. <li id="cite_note-181"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-181">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20180813074958/http://pomorskie.travel/en/Discover-Cultural_heritage-Others/5502/Wis_a" rel="nofollow">Vistula River</a>. pomorskie.travel.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2018-08-13</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://pomorskie.travel/en/Discover-Cultural_heritage-Others/5502/Wis_a" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2018-08-13）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.atitle=Vistula+River&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=pomorskie.travel&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fpomorskie.travel%2Fen%2FDiscover-Cultural_heritage-Others%2F5502%2FWis_a&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-182"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-182">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Christine Zuchora-Walske. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=9dx2AgAAQBAJ&amp;q=%22a+higher+density+of+lakes+than+Poland%22" rel="nofollow">The Lakes Region</a>. Poland. ABDO Publishing. 2013: 28 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2021-07-19</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1-61480-877-0" title="Special:网络书源/978-1-61480-877-0"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1-61480-877-0</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20191216011739/https://books.google.com/books?id=9dx2AgAAQBAJ&amp;q=%22a+higher+density+of+lakes+than+Poland%22" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2019-12-16）. <q><i>Insert:</i> Poland is home to 9,300 lakes. Finland is the only European nation with a higher density of lakes than Poland.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.atitle=The+Lakes+Region&amp;rft.au=Christine+Zuchora-Walske&amp;rft.btitle=Poland&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-61480-877-0&amp;rft.pages=28&amp;rft.pub=ABDO+Publishing&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D9dx2AgAAQBAJ%26q%3D%2522a%2Bhigher%2Bdensity%2Bof%2Blakes%2Bthan%2BPoland%2522&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-195"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-195">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Kevin Hillstrom; Laurie Collier Hillstrom. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531075700/https://books.google.com/books?id=dMexywMD_okC&amp;q=%2240%2C000+breeding+pairs%22" rel="nofollow">Europe: A Continental Overview of Environmental Issues, Volume 4</a>. <li id="cite_note-ConPol-207"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-ConPol_207-0"><sup><b>207.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-ConPol_207-1"><sup><b>207.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-ConPol_207-2"><sup><b>207.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Granat, Mirosław; Granat, Katarzyna. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531053541/https://books.google.com/books?id=AJzGDwAAQBAJ&amp;dq=poland+senate+first-past-the-post+100&amp;pg=PA52" rel="nofollow">The Constitution of Poland: A Contextual Analysis</a>. <li id="cite_note-218"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-218">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Zsuzsa Csergo; Daina Stukuls Eglitis; Paula M Pickering. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531133259/https://books.google.com/books?id=ibgzEAAAQBAJ&amp;dq=poland+abortion+rape+incest+danger&amp;pg=PA168" rel="nofollow">Central and East European Politics: Changes and Challenges</a>. <li id="cite_note-230"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-230">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Deni, John R. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531133308/https://books.google.com/books?id=B6QQEAAAQBAJ&amp;dq=decades+closest+allies+us+poland&amp;pg=PA148" rel="nofollow">Coalition of the unwilling and unable: European realignment and the future of American geopolitics</a>. <li id="cite_note-287"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-287">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation journal">Barcikowska, Renata. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200501152808/https://content.sciendo.com/view/journals/minib/21/3/article-p141.xml" rel="nofollow">Research Institutes In Poland — Evaluation of Their Place and Role in Innovative Politics in Poland</a>. <li id="cite_note-299"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-299">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Statistics Poland. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220306123848/https://stat.gov.pl/en/national-census/national-population-and-housing-census-2021/national-population-and-housing-census-2021/preliminary-results-of-the-national-population-and-housing-census-2021,1,1.html" rel="nofollow">Preliminary results of the National Population and Housing Census 2021</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-300"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-300">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Statistics Poland. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220306132200/https://stat.gov.pl/en/topics/population/population/area-and-population-in-the-territorial-profile-in-2021,4,15.html" rel="nofollow">Area and population in the territorial profile</a>. <li id="cite_note-315"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-315">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Natalia Kucirkova; Catherine E Snow; Vibeke Grøver; Catherine McBride. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220531075700/https://books.google.com/books?id=sUAlDwAAQBAJ&amp;dq=polish+mother+tongue+97+percent&amp;pg=PA139" rel="nofollow">The Routledge international handbook of early literacy education</a>. <li id="cite_note-Infographic-328"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Infographic_328-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170309160430/https://stat.gov.pl/en/infographics-and-widgets/infographics/infographic-religiousness-of-polish-inhabitiants,4,1.html" rel="nofollow">Infographic - Religiousness of Polish inhabitants</a>. stat.gov.pl. </li>
<li id="cite_note-341"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-341">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://www.worldstopexports.com/international-markets-for-imported-drugs-by-country/" rel="nofollow">Imports of Drugs and Medicines by Country</a>. <li id="cite_note-The_Music_Courts_of_the_Polish_Vasas-369"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-The_Music_Courts_of_the_Polish_Vasas_369-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www.webcitation.org/5h7rxPZrB?url=http://www.semper.pl/muzyczne_dwory_summary.pdf" rel="nofollow">The Music Courts of the Polish Vasas</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. www.semper.pl: 244.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2009-05-13</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.semper.pl/muzyczne_dwory_summary.pdf" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>存档于2009-05-29）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.atitle=The+Music+Courts+of+the+Polish+Vasas&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=www.semper.pl&amp;rft.pages=244&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.semper.pl%2Fmuzyczne_dwory_summary.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-370"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-370">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Wolff, Larry. <a class="external text" href="https://www.google.com.au/books/edition/The_Idea_of_Galicia/tgjQYHn7BTkC?hl=en&amp;gbpv=0" rel="nofollow">The Idea of Galicia; History and Fantasy in Habsburg Political Culture</a>. <li id="cite_note-381"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-381">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Miłobędzki, Adam. <a class="external text" href="https://www.google.com.au/books/edition/Architektura_Ziem_Polski/QAMtAQAAIAAJ?hl=en&amp;gbpv=0&amp;bsq=pa%C5%82ac%20biskup%C3%B3w%20kielce%20manieryzm" rel="nofollow">The architecture of Poland : a chapter of the European heritage</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-RENAISSANCE_CULTURAL_BACKGROUND-382"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-RENAISSANCE_CULTURAL_BACKGROUND_382-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Many designs imitated the arcaded courtyard and arched loggias of the Wawel palace. <cite class="citation web">Michael J. Mikoś. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190317014141/http://www.staropolska.pl/ang/renaissance/Mikos_renaissance/Cultural_r.html" rel="nofollow">Renaissance Cultural Background</a>. www.staropolska.pl: 9.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2009-04-23</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.staropolska.pl/ang/renaissance/Mikos_renaissance/Cultural_r.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2019-03-17）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.atitle=Renaissance+Cultural+Background&amp;rft.au=Michael+J.+Miko%C5%9B&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=www.staropolska.pl&amp;rft.pages=9&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.staropolska.pl%2Fang%2Frenaissance%2FMikos_renaissance%2FCultural_r.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-383"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-383">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation journal">Stanley, John. </li>
<li id="cite_note-432"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-432">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Tzvetkova, Juliana. <a class="external text" href="https://www.google.com.au/books/edition/Pop_Culture_in_Europe/Zk83DwAAQBAJ?hl=en&amp;gbpv=0" rel="nofollow">Pop Culture in Central Europe</a>. ABC-CLIO. 2017-10-12: 188. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1-4408-4466-9" title="Special:网络书源/978-1-4408-4466-9"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1-4408-4466-9</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;rft.aufirst=Juliana&amp;rft.aulast=Tzvetkova&amp;rft.btitle=Pop+Culture+in+Central+Europe&amp;rft.date=2017-10-12&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4408-4466-9&amp;rft.pages=188&amp;rft.pub=ABC-CLIO&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com.au%2Fbooks%2Fedition%2FPop_Culture_in_Europe%2FZk83DwAAQBAJ%3Fhl%3Den%26gbpv%3D0&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.93.BE.E6.8E.A5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部链接">外部链接</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0&amp;action=edit&amp;section=46" title="编辑章节：外部链接">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<li><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Wikimedia-logo.svg"><img alt="Wikimedia-logo.svg" data-file-height="1024" data-file-width="1024" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/15px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/23px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/81/Wikimedia-logo.svg/30px-Wikimedia-logo.svg.png 2x" width="15"/></a> <a class="extiw" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Atlas_of_Poland" title="commons:Atlas of Poland">維基媒體的Poland地圖集</a> <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Gnome-globe.svg"><img alt="Gnome-globe.svg" data-file-height="48" data-file-width="48" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/15px-Gnome-globe.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/23px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/30px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 2x" width="15"/></a></li>

<ul><li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Cultural history of Poland" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="波兰文化史"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96%E5%8F%B2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="波兰文化史（页面不存在）">文化史</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultural_history_of_Poland" title="en:Cultural history of Poland"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Cultural history of Poland</span></a></span>）</span></span></li>

<div style="padding-left:0.75em;">
<p><span class="nowrap">
<a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD" title="法国">法国</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%B7%B4%E9%BB%8E" title="巴黎">巴黎</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD" title="英国">英国</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6" title="伦敦">伦敦</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD" title="德国">德国</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E6%9F%8F%E6%9E%97" title="柏林">柏林</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%8D%B7%E5%85%B0%E7%8E%8B%E5%9B%BD" title="荷兰王国">荷蘭</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%86%E6%96%AF%E7%89%B9%E4%B8%B9" title="阿姆斯特丹">阿姆斯特丹</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%94%E5%88%A9%E6%97%B6" title="比利时">比利时</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%83%E9%B2%81%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94" title="布鲁塞尔">布鲁塞尔</a><br/>
<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%9B%A7%E6%A3%AE%E5%A0%A1" title="盧森堡">盧森堡</a> - <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%9B%A7%E6%A3%AE%E5%A0%A1_(%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82)" title="盧森堡 (城市)">盧森堡市</a><br/>
<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%88%B1%E5%B0%94%E5%85%B0%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD" title="爱尔兰共和国">愛爾蘭</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%83%BD%E6%9F%8F%E6%9E%97" title="都柏林">都柏林</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%91%A9%E7%BA%B3%E5%93%A5" title="摩纳哥">摩纳哥</a><span style="font-size:smaller;">（城邦）</span><br/>
</span></p>
</div>
</div></td><td style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;;;;width:18em;"><div>
<div style="padding-left:0.75em;">
<p><span class="nowrap">
<a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%B9%E9%BA%A6" title="丹麦">丹麦</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%93%A5%E6%9C%AC%E5%93%88%E6%A0%B9" title="哥本哈根">哥本哈根</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%8C%AA%E5%A8%81" title="挪威">挪威</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A5%E6%96%AF%E9%99%86" title="奥斯陆">奥斯陆</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E7%91%9E%E5%85%B8" title="瑞典">瑞典</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E6%96%AF%E5%BE%B7%E5%93%A5%E5%B0%94%E6%91%A9" title="斯德哥尔摩">斯德哥尔摩</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%8A%AC%E5%85%B0" title="芬兰">芬兰</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E8%B5%AB%E5%B0%94%E8%BE%9B%E5%9F%BA" title="赫尔辛基">赫尔辛基</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E5%86%B0%E5%B2%9B" title="冰岛">冰岛</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%B7%E5%85%8B%E9%9B%85%E7%B6%AD%E5%85%8B" title="雷克雅維克">雷克雅未克</a><br/>
</span></p>
</div>
</div></td><td style="border-left:2px solid #fdfdfd;padding:0px;;;;width:18em;"><div>
<div style="padding-left:0.75em;">
<p><span class="nowrap">
<a href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99" title="西班牙">西班牙</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C" title="马德里">马德里</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%91%A1%E8%90%84%E7%89%99" title="葡萄牙">葡萄牙</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%E6%9C%AC" title="里斯本">里斯本</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9" title="意大利">意大利</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E7%BD%97%E9%A9%AC" title="罗马">罗马</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%8C%E8%85%8A" title="希腊">希腊</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%85%E5%85%B8" title="雅典">雅典</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%9F%E8%80%B3%E5%85%B6" title="土耳其">土耳其</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%AE%89%E5%8D%A1%E6%8B%89" title="安卡拉">安卡拉</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E8%B3%BD%E6%99%AE%E5%8B%92%E6%96%AF" title="賽普勒斯">賽普勒斯</a> - <a href="/wiki/%E5%B0%BC%E7%A7%91%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A" title="尼科西亚">尼科西亚</a><br/>
<a href="/wiki/%E6%A2%B5%E8%92%82%E5%86%88" title="梵蒂冈">梵蒂冈</a><span style="font-size:smaller;">（城邦）</span><br/>

<h3 class="vector-menu-heading" id="p-help-label">
<span class="vector-menu-heading-label">帮助</span>
</h3>
<div class="vector-menu-content">
<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-help"><a href="/wiki/Help:%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95" title="寻求帮助"><span>帮助</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-portal"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E7%A4%BE%E7%BE%A4%E9%A6%96%E9%A1%B5" title="关于本计划、你可以做什么、应该如何做"><span>维基社群</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-policy"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E6%96%B9%E9%87%9D%E8%88%87%E6%8C%87%E5%BC%95" title="查看维基百科的方针和指引"><span>方针与指引</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-villagepump"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E4%BA%92%E5%8A%A9%E5%AE%A2%E6%A0%88" title="参与维基百科社群的讨论"><span>互助客栈</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-Information_desk"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E7%9F%A5%E8%AF%86%E9%97%AE%E7%AD%94" title="解答任何与维基百科无关的问题的地方"><span>知识问答</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-conversion"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E5%AD%97%E8%AF%8D%E8%BD%AC%E6%8D%A2" title="提出字词转换请求"><span>字词转换</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-IRC"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:IRC%E8%81%8A%E5%A4%A9%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93"><span>IRC即时聊天</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-contact"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E8%81%94%E7%BB%9C%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC" title="如何联络维基百科"><span>联络我们</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="n-about"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E" title="查看维基百科的简介"><span>关于维基百科</span></a></li></ul>
